effect_entries.effect:
Changes the weather to hail for five turns, during which non-ice Pokémon are damaged for 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn.

If the user is holding icy rock, this effect lasts for eight turns.

blizzard has 100% accuracy.  If the target has used detect or protect, blizzard has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis heal only 1/4 of the user's max HP.

Pokémon with snow cloak are exempt from this effect's damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Summons a hailstorm that
strikes every turn.

strikes every turn.

A hailstorm lasting
five turns damages
all POKéMON except
the ICE-type.

Invoque une tempête de grêle qui dure 5
tours. Ne blesse pas les Pokémon de type
Glace.

The user summons a hailstorm lasting five
turns. It damages all Pokémon except the
Ice type.

The user summons a hailstorm lasting five
turns. It damages all Pokémon except the
Ice type.

５ターンの　あいだ　あられを　ふらして
こおりタイプで　ない　ポケモン
ぜんいんに　ダメージを　あたえる。

5턴 동안 싸라기눈을 내리게 해
얼음타입이 아닌 포켓몬
모두에게 데미지를 준다.

Invoque une tempête de grêle qui dure cinq tours.
Ne blesse pas les Pokémon de type Glace.

Hagelsturm für fünf Runden. Schadet allen,
außer Eis-Pokémon.

Tormenta de granizo que dura cinco turnos. Hiere
a todos, excepto a los de tipo Hielo.

Chi la usa causa una grandinata che dura
cinque turni. Danneggia tutti i Pokémon
tranne quelli di tipo Ghiaccio.

The user summons a hailstorm lasting five
turns. It damages all Pokémon except the
Ice type.

こおりタイプで　ない　ポケモン
全員に　ダメージを　与える。

降下冰雹，在５回合內
場上除了冰屬性以外的寶可夢
都會受到傷害。
